websites.description: This site. :) Simple website to display blaalbaa, AngularJS, Firebase diibadaaba

Website for our heavy metal band Kiuas. Data such as gigs, news etc. are in a MySQL database. PHP is used to communicate with the DB and used for some other logic on the site. Also includes a light admin page for updating news, gigs, reviews and interviews. The site has gone through several designs throughout the years. Most of the graphics by me.
